gr.ntua.vision.monitoring
Class VisionMonitoring

java.lang.Object
  gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.XdasPublisher
      gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.VisionMonitoring

public class VisionMonitoring
extends XdasPublisher

The monitoring library singleton.

The singleton should be initialized prior to its use. Each component should choose a UUID and call initialize(String, UUID) with it. The first argument should be the Monitoring Cluster instance event receiving interface. Assuming the cluster instance runs on the IP X.Y.Z.W, then the address is http://X.Y.Z.W:8080/vismo/Monitoring/push/event. Thus, the singleton can be initialized with the following:


UUID appId = UUID.randomUUID();
VisionMonitoring.initialize( "http://10.0.2.111:8080/vismo/Monitoring/push/event", appId );
As soon as the singleton is initialized, then its log(URL, URL, String, String, int, int, Map, List) method may be called to commit an event. For example:

List<Resource> resources = Lists.newArrayList();
resources.add( new ResourceImpl( "memory", "MB", Math.random() * 3096 ) );
resources.add( new ResourceImpl( "storage", "GB", Math.random() * 1024 ) );

String[] action = Actions[Math.min( (int) Math.floor( Actions.length * Math.random() ), Actions.length - 1 )];

URL src = new URL( "http://localhost:7070/some/component/" );
URL trg = new URL( "http://otherhost:9090/some/other/component/" );

Map params = new HashMap();
params.put( "foo", "bar" );
params.put( "foo1", "bar1" );
params.put( "foo2", "bar2" );

VisionMonitoring.instance().log( src, trg, "foo", "bar",
XDasEventType.XDAS_AE_MODIFY_DATA_ITEM_ASSOC_CONTEXT.getEventCode(),
XdasOutcomes.XDAS_OUT_SUCCESS.getOutcomeCode(), params, resources );

log

public void log(java.net.URL source,
                java.net.URL target,
                java.lang.String user,
                java.lang.String tenant,
                int xdasType,
                int xdasStatus,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters,
                java.util.List<Resource> resources)
         throws java.lang.Exception
log an action

Parameters:
source - action source
target - action target. It may be null.
user - user performing the action, if any, otherwise null.
tenant - tenant performing the action, if any, otherwise null.
xdasType - type of action. Use the XDasEventType.*.XDasEventType.getEventCode() to fill this.
xdasStatus - status of action. Use the XdasOutcomes.*.XdasOutcomes.getOutcomeCode() to fill this.
parameters - parameters of action (action specific data). This can be filled in with any values necessary to describe the action at the detail level required.
resources - the list with all resources that are consumed by the logged action. The default resource implementation is ResourceImpl.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
